final_poem:
Beneath skies of azure gleam,  
Where sunbeams dance and streams stream,  
Arise from winter' endless night,  
And welcome back Spring’s delightful sight:    
A canvas splashed with colors bright;          
Adorned in hues that banish blight.     
With petals flushed like morning rose,      
From cold asleep the sleeping pose awake -  Unfurling and spread their charm anew, under azure skies of eternal daybreak’s glare where sunbeams dance to paint a picture clear:   The earth revives; she sigh.     Now in our sightly view      
A vibrant world unfurls before us-    A celebration without measure or cease!  Spring is the season now, as life renewed on every blade of grass and leaf - Our hearts take flight like birds released from cages to sing their songs for joy. The time has come again when earth sighs beneath her verdant mantle; here she restores herself after winter's long siege-    From Winter’ endless night: 
The frost retreats, and thawing streams   Do humbly bow at Nature's green revival. The sun stands guard over all this beauty as it unfolds upon her emerald shoulders; thus begins our journey through the season of Spring in its glorious revelation—a time when hope takes form within every living thing:   
From Winter’ endless night,   Under skies where dreams are born and never die -  As we walk these paths carpeted with newfound green- Our spirits rise to join this resurrection scene. Spring arrives at last without fail or fear of loss; behold the spectacle she bestows upon us—A time when life rekindles its fire within every seed, stone and soul alike:   The earth revives - 
From Winter’s endless night To springtime's sweet embrace We journey forth on paths carpeted with newfound green; With each step our hearts sing in joyous chorus echoing through nature unbound by wintery spell—A time when life rekindles its fire within every seed, stone and soul alike:   The earth revives - 
From Winter’s endless night To springtime's sweet embrace We journey forth on paths carpeted with newfound green; With each step our hearts sing in joyous chorus echoing through nature unbound by wintery spell—A time when life rekindles its fire within every seed, stone and soul alike:   The earth revives -
